title: TWAIN HARTE SCHOOL DISTRICT is accepting apps for a
text:
TWAIN HARTE SCHOOL DISTRICT is accepting apps for a ad date: 10/06/2015 
TWAIN HARTE SCHOOL DISTRICT is accepting apps for a 10-month Maintenance Worker/Custodian/ Substitute Bus Driver- $12.97-19.14/hr. Valid CA Class B unrestricted Drivers License w/passenger & air brake endorsement desired and valid CA School Bus Drivers Certificate; OR be willing to be trained after hire. Background check, random drug testing and pre- employment physical are reqd. Applications avail at Twain Harte School District Office 22997 Joaquin Gully Rd
